description: This file defines Pydantic models for workspace-related data schemas used in an API, including creation, update, deletion, event handling, and identification of workspaces.

classes.name: WorkspaceCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new workspace, including optional git URL, visibility, and additional data.

classes.name: WorkspaceUpdate
classes.description: Schema for updating an existing workspace, with optional fields for various attributes and active status.

classes.name: WorkspaceDelete
classes.description: Schema for deleting a workspace, identified by workspace ID and optional name.

classes.name: WorkspaceEvent
classes.description: Schema representing an event related to a workspace, including event type, status, and optional data.

classes.name: WorkspaceSchema
classes.description: Schema for workspace data returned by the API, including ID, name, status, URL, and additional data.

classes.name: WorkspaceIdentifier
classes.description: Schema for identifying a workspace via key or ID.
